root.name: Quick Yoga Training
root.description: OverviewWith over 180 yoga poses, users of this Nintendo DS game are given the opportunity to practice yoga in their own pace. The game has different modes to select like allaying pain, exercise, and relaxation. It also takes advantage of the DS stylus buy letting users freely move the camera so one can see the poses from all angles.
